item.title: romney still up in new hampshire; trump a wild card
item.description: former massachusetts governor mitt romney leads potential republican primary opponents in the early voting state of new hampshire, but celebrity candidate donald trump has substantial support, according to a new poll.

item.description: scores of websites and internet services like foursquare and reddit crashed or had limited availability thursday because of problems at a data center run by amazon.com.

item.title: thornburg trustee sues big banks for $2.2 billion
item.description: the trustee for bankrupt thornburg mortgage inc has sued goldman sachs, barclays and other big banks for a combined $2.2 billion, blaming them for the former home loan company's bankruptcy.

item.description: with summer approaching, the city is distributing 1,000 55-gallon barrels to homeowners to help conserve water and reduce pressure on the sewer system.

item.description: a cell treatment to prevent new organs being rejected without the need for lifelong courses of immune drugs is showing promise in mice and may one day make human transplants easier, scientists said.

item.description: the company said the underlying health of its business had never been better, despite the challenges of higher costs and a weak economy.

item.description: as we grow older, we forget things like where we parked the car. exercise can sharpen our recall.
